it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    class which represent a Player.
    • effectList: the list of effects related to this player. Effects in this list are taken from CAHRACHTER card permanent effect ane excommunication effect
    • familyMemberList: the list of family members owned by the player
    • flags: HashMap used to map effects of excommunication card. Adding a flag to this hashmap means that the player will suffer the effect of the excommunication. the JsonValue is used to customize the effect
    • gameID: the ID of the game to whitch the player has been registered
    • name: the player's name
    • personalBoard: the personal board owned by this player
    • personalBonusTile: the personal bonus tile assigned to this player
    • resources: the resources owned by the player
    • uuid: the UUID of this player
    See Also:
    PersonalBoard, PersonalBonusTile, Effect, ResourceSet, FamilyMember
